Warning: We are independent developers and are not affiliated with the original creators of the game Sliver Palace.
Notgoogle: Our authentication is not related to Google
Welcome: Welcome to our fan site dedicated to the game Silver Palace — one of the most anticipated gaming projects!
WhatWeDo: We collect and publish the most up-to-date info: latest news, guides for beginners and experienced players, character breakdowns, as well as insider info and leaks before official release. Our goal is to be the first and most reliable source for Silver Palace information.
WhoAreWe: We are a team of players as passionate as you are. We love exploring mechanics, finding hidden details, and sharing our discoveries with the community. If you’re also waiting for Silver Palace and want to stay informed — you’ve come to the right place!
JoinUs: Follow updates, leave comments, share with friends, and become part of our community!
